luascript.code:
menuTextTimer = 0
menuTextTimer_id = 0
local pulldown_menu_text1 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT1")
local pulldown_menu_text2 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT2")
local pulldown_menu_time = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TIME")
local pulldown_menu_week_text = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_WEEK_TEXT")

local num_batery_precentage = gui:getComponentByName("NUM_BATTERY_PERCENTAGE")
local bluetooth_pic = gui:getComponentByName("BLUETOOTH_PIC")
local batery_pic = gui:getComponentByName("BATTERY_PIC")
function menuText(mytable)
	local menu_flag = utils:rand32()
	pulldown_menu_text1:hide(true)
	pulldown_menu_text2:hide(true)
	pulldown_menu_time:show(true)
	pulldown_menu_week_text:show(true)

	batery_pic:showImageByIndex(menu_flag % 10, true)
	bluetooth_pic:showImageByIndex(menu_flag % 2, true)
	num_batery_precentage:setNumber(menu_flag % 100, true)
	pulldown_menu_week_text:showTextByIndex(menu_flag % 7)
	date_table = {menu_flag % 13, menu_flag % 13, menu_flag % 31}
	pulldown_menu_time:setSystemDate(date_table, true)
	return 0
end
menuTextTimer = sys:createTimer(menuText, 1000, 2)

--menuTextTimer = nil
--menuTextTimer_id = nil
--menuText_table = nil

luascript.code:
if not disturb_flag then
disturb_flag = 0
end
local undisturb_pic = gui:getComponentByName("UNDISTURB_PIC")
undisturb_pic:showImageByIndex(disturb_flag,false)

if(disturb_flag == 0) then
local pulldown_menu_layout = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDONW_MENU_LAYOUT")
local undisturb_layout = gui:getComponentByName("UNDISTURB_LAYOUT")
pulldown_menu_layout:hide(true)
undisturb_layout:show(true)
end
if(disturb_flag == 1) then
local undisturb_pic = gui:getComponentByName("UNDISTURB_PIC")
disturb_flag = 0
undisturb_pic:showImageByIndex(disturb_flag)
local pulldown_menu_text1 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT1")
local pulldown_menu_time = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TIME")
local pulldown_menu_week_text = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_WEEK_TEXT")
pulldown_menu_time:hide(true)
pulldown_menu_week_text:hide(true)
pulldown_menu_text1:show(true)
pulldown_menu_text1:showTextByIndex(3, true)
menuTextTimer:stop()
menuTextTimer_id = menuTextTimer:run()
end

if not light_flag then
light_flag = 0
end

local pulldown_menu_text1 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT1")
local pulldown_menu_text2 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT2")
local bright_screen_pic = gui:getComponentByName("BRIGHT_SCREEN_PIC")
light_flag = light_flag + 1
bright_screen_pic:showImageByIndex(light_flag % 2)
if(light_flag % 2 == 1) then
pulldown_menu_text1:showTextByIndex(0, true)
pulldown_menu_text2:showTextByIndex(0, true)
menuTextTimer:stop()
menuTextTimer_id = menuTextTimer:run()
end
if(light_flag % 2 == 0) then
local pulldown_menu_time = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TIME")
local pulldown_menu_week_text = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_WEEK_TEXT")
pulldown_menu_time:hide(true)
pulldown_menu_week_text:hide(true)
pulldown_menu_text1:showTextByIndex(1, true)
menuTextTimer:stop()
menuTextTimer_id = menuTextTimer:run()
end
gui:switchPageByName(0XD420035,"right")
gui:switchPageByName(0XCC20033,"right")
gui:switchPageByName(0XA420029,"right")

local pulldown_menu_text1 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT1")
local pulldown_menu_text2 = gui:getComponentByName("PULLDOWN_MENU_TEXT2")
print("disturb_flag : "..disturb_flag)
if(disturb_flag == 1) then
pulldown_menu_text1:show(false)
pulldown_menu_text2:show(false)
pulldown_menu_text1:showTextByIndex(2, false) 
pulldown_menu_text2:showTextByIndex(4, false) 
menuTextTimer:stop()
menuTextTimer_id = menuTextTimer:run()
end
gui:switchPageByName(0X20020000,"right")

luascript.code:
local message_type_layout = gui:getComponentByName("MESSAGE_TYPE_LAYOUT")
local vlist_notice = gui:getComponentByName("VLIST_NOTICE")
show_flag = 1
message_type_layout:hide()
vlist_notice:show()

local message_title = gui:getComponentByName("MESSAGE_TYPE")
local message_content = gui:getComponentByName("MESSAGE_CONTENT")
local message_pic = gui:getComponentByName("MESSAGE_PIC")
message = utils:message_load()
local index = vlist_notice:getGridCurIndex()
message_len = utils:message_len_load(index + message_index - 1)
message_title:setText(message[index + message_index].title, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.title_len)
message_content:setText(message[index + message_index].content, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.content_len)
message_pic:showImageByIndex(message[index + message_index].type - 1, false)
message_index = nil

--if not vlist_notice then
--vlist_notice = gui:getComponentByName("VLIST_NOTICE")
--local index = vlist_notice:getGridCurIndex()
--end

luascript.code:
text_title_2 = gui:getComponentByName("TEXT_TITLE2")
text_content_2 = gui:getComponentByName("TEXT_CONTENT2")
pic_app_icon2 = gui:getComponentByName("PIC_APP_ICON2")
message_len = utils:message_len_load(2)
text_title_2:setText(message[3].title, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.title_len)
text_content_2:setText(message[3].content, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.content_len)
pic_app_icon2:showImageByIndex(message[3].type - 1, false)

text_title_2 = nil
text_content_2 = nil
pic_app_icon2 = nil

--local pic_app_icon2 = gui:getComponentByName("PIC_APP_ICON2")
--pic_app_icon2:showImageByIndex(message[3].type - 1, false)

local message_type_layout = gui:getComponentByName("MESSAGE_TYPE_LAYOUT")
local vlist_notice = gui:getComponentByName("VLIST_NOTICE")
message_len = utils:message_len_load(2)
message_index = 3
message_type_layout:show()
vlist_notice:hide()

if not show_flag then
show_flag = 0
end
vlist_notice = gui:getComponentByName("VLIST_NOTICE")
message = utils:message_load()
message_num = #message
vlist_notice:initGridDynamic(message_num, 1, false)

if(show_flag == 0) then
local index = vlist_notice:getGridCurIndex()
message_len = utils:message_len_load(index)
text_title_0:setText(message[index + 1].title, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.title_len)
text_content_0:setText(message[index + 1].content, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.content_len)
pic_app_icon0:showImageByIndex(message[index + 1].type - 1, false)
message_len = utils:message_len_load(index + 1)
text_title_1:setText(message[index + 2].title, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.title_len)
text_content_1:setText(message[index + 2].content, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.content_len)
pic_app_icon1:showImageByIndex(message[index + 2].type - 1, false)
message_len = utils:message_len_load(index + 2)
text_title_2:setText(message[index + 3].title, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.title_len)
text_content_2:setText(message[index + 3].content, false, 2, 2, 0, message_len.content_len)
pic_app_icon2:showImageByIndex(message[index + 3].type - 1, false)
end

if notice_list then
	notice_list = nil
end
